camping01.description: Felix's preschool has gone camping in Mendocino every Memorial Day for the last 25 years.
camping01.title: Camping 1

camping02.description:
Dean, Torin and Milo hold hands. In the background, Jadah practises hula hoop.

Everyone hung out in each others' cabins, especially in the chilly evenings. Dean and Lucie are, ahem, underskilled at building fires, so we roasted our marshmallows on borrowed flames.
camping02.title: Camping 2

camping03.description: The most exiting animal encounter?  This banana slug -- or in Milo-ese, "nana tug".
camping03.title: Camping 3

camping04.description: Our cabin was the place to see and be seen. Felix constantly invited friends over to check out his toys or jump in Milo's crib.  Felix roamed the camp unsupervised, with packs of kids.
camping04.title: Camping 4

camping05.description: We took a hike to the river.
camping05.title: Camping 5

camping06.description: Phineas is Georgianna's little brother. Like Milo, he starts New School in September.  Like Milo, he had to be closely supervised on this trip to make sure he didn't fall down the hills or frolic in poison oak.
camping06.title: Camping 6

camping07.description: <u>Top to bottom, left to right</u>:  Kora, Felix, Georgianna, Adar, Amit, Milo, Torin.
camping07.title: Camping 7

camping08.description:
Amit and Georgie are best friends.

Amit and his brother Adar are moving back to Israel soon. They will be missed, not least for challenging gender stereotypes. Amit is a boy, but he exclusively wears dresses. None of his classmates tease him about it. You gotta love Berkeley!
camping08.title: Camping 8

camping09.description: Kora, Felix and Adar.  Adar, like his brother, favors dresses.  As we've found, little brothers ALWAYS want to be like their big brothers.
camping09.title: Camping 9

camping10.description: Ayelet (Amit and Adar's mom) listens to Chris (Kora and Torin's dad) entertain the gang.
camping10.title: Camping 10

camping11.description: Dean, Jules, Torin, Kora, Milo and Felix enjoy breakfast in the dining hall.
camping11.title: Camping 11

camping12.description: The parents all took turns cooking and cleaning. We followed instructions for menus that haven't changed in the last 25 years.
camping12.title: Camping 12

camping13.description: Lucie and the boys went up Friday morning.  Dean came Saturday in a rental car.  And what a car!  Felix and Milo (and every other kid at camp) approved.
camping13.title: Camping 13

glassbeach01.description: The troops visit Glass Beach.  There once was a glass factory nearby -- the sand was chock full of colorful water-smoothed glass pebbles. Felix was in rock collecting heaven.
glassbeach01.title: Glassbeach 1

glassbeach04.description: Perry, Owen and Katy. They are expecting a baby girl in August. Yay!
glassbeach04.title: Glassbeach 4

glassbeach06.description: Katherine and Henry. Henry will also start in Milo's class. His brother Bennet is in Felix's class.
glassbeach06.title: Glassbeach 6

glassbeach07.description: Milo and Felix raid Dean's pockets for M&Ms.
glassbeach07.title: Glassbeach 7

glassbeach08.description: Cindee and Torin were brave enough to put their feet in the frigid Northern California water.
glassbeach08.title: Glassbeach 8

glassbeach10.description: Adar and Amit pounce on their sunbathing mother.
glassbeach10.title: Glassbeach 10

glassbeach11.description: The best thing about the trip was the way we all looked out for each other's children. The kids loved the freedom to come and go, and it made life easier for the adults as well.
glassbeach11.title: Glassbeach 11

icecream.description: Back in Berkeley.  Amit, Kora, Torin, Owen and Felix enjoy ice cream from the fancy new ice cream parlor on Shattuck avenue.  On hot days, it's the perfect destination for an after school treat.
icecream.title: Icecream

office1.description:
Now that Dean's company got funding, they got an office and hired two people.

Left to right: Grant, Ed, George and Giles check out the new office.
office1.title: Office 1

office2.description: The office space wasn't ready this week, so they worked out of a hotel conference room.
office2.title: Office 2

skype.description: Lucie, international design consultant. Her current project has her working for a client in Tel Aviv, via a design agency in San Francisco. She conference calls Israel using Skype, a free internet phone service, from the comfort of her home.
skype.title: Skype

description:
We spent Memorial Day weekend camping with nearly all of Felix's school. It was great! We tend to think of Felix as a bit of an introvert, but seeing him immersed with tons of friends and outgoing with all the parents, we're starting to change our minds.

For a few weeks we've been thinking Milo knows some numbers and colors. At least he loves to mumble along with us when we count. And he'll say 'boo' or 'geen' at suspiciously appropriate times.

Milo has also begun to sing by himself a lot. Favorites: Skip to M'Loo and the bad guy theme music from Star Wars.
title: May 29
